title: Analyzing the Effectiveness of Science Education Using Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Analyzes the design and effectiveness of microlearning for working professionals to acquire and apply scientific knowledge efficiently in mobile environments.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core principles of scientific experiment design with 85% or higher accuracy via microlearning modules.
Learners successfully complete at least three practical assignments using multimedia materials provided in mobile environments.
Learners can demonstrate a 20% or higher improvement in knowledge acquisition through pre- and post-microlearning comparative assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
